words.defineEn: to legally become someone's wife or husband
words.defineVi: để hợp pháp trở thành vợ hoặc chồng của một ai đó

examples: Their bread and butter is reporting local events.
The event finished with a spectacular fireworks display.
These events occurred within living memory.
The tragic event tore the community out of its sense of normalcy.
The paper’s bread and butter is reporting local events in a small community.
words.defineEn: anything that takes place, particularly something important
words.defineVi: bất cứ điều gì diễn ra, đặc biệt là một cái gì đó quan trọng

examples: Tongues were wagging over their engagement.
The company's latest advertising campaign was a huge success, hitting it out of the park with record-breaking sales and customer engagement.
All engagement really helps the channel growth.
The other one is Arctic engagement.
I just see the engagement.
words.defineEn: an agreement between two people to get married or the duration of this agreement
words.defineVi: một thỏa thuận giữa hai người để kết hôn hoặc thời hạn của thỏa thuận này

words.defineEn: an event that consists of two people legally becoming each other's wife or husband
words.defineVi: một sự kiện bao gồm hai người hợp pháp trở thành vợ hoặc chồng của nhau

examples: The wedding ceremony went off without a hitch.
The bride's wedding dress is white.
The wedding celebrations went like a dream.
My brother's heartbreak is casting a cloud over my wedding.
My grandparents celebrated their sixtieth wedding anniversary.
words.defineEn: the event of a marriage ceremony
words.defineVi: sự kiện của một lễ cưới

examples: I couldn't get any mobile phone reception.
The decorations were specially designed for the wedding reception.
Guests at the outdoor wedding reception enjoye grilled beefsteaks as the main course.
There's an ATM in the reception area which will change your English money.
My wedding was supposed to be my special day, but my sister and her stupid boyfriend took the stage when he proposed to her at the wedding reception.
words.defineEn: a formal party held to celebrate an event or welcome someone
words.defineVi: một bữa tiệc chính thức được tổ chức để chào mừng một sự kiện hoặc chào đón ai đó

examples: The crowd wished them well as they left for their honeymoon.
I said, "The honeymoon stage?"
What's after the honeymoon stage?
It was like the honeymoon phase, right?
I thought that that sounds about right, the honeymoon stage.
words.defineVi: một kỳ nghỉ được thực hiện bởi các cặp vợ chồng mới cưới

examples: When planning their wedding, Michael and his fiancé took their event planner's advice on the venue, catering, and decorations.
Julia's fiancé left her at the altar, causing her immense heartbreak and embarrassment.
She and her fiance are raising two grandchildren between them, also because of substance addiction.
She and her fiance are raising two grandchildren between them, also because of substance addiction.
I had texted my fiance, and it was a big jumbled mess, and that's when he pretty much
words.defineEn: a man who is engaged to someone
words.defineVi: một người đàn ông đã đính hôn với ai đó

examples: John's family had concerns about his fiancée, suspecting she might be a gold digger who was after his inheritance.
Andrew Morton, a royal biographer, said Prince Harry's fiancee will pick up the baton from Princess Diana because Markle's age of 36 is the same as Princess Diana's when she passed away in 1997.
My success is largely attributable to my fiancee.
Tommy Wolikow and his fiancee, Rochelle Carlisle, met while working at the factory.
And, alas, she played Bianca, the girlfriend or fiancee of Chris.
words.defineEn: a woman who is engaged to someone
words.defineVi: một người phụ nữ đã đính hôn với ai đó

examples: The bride's wedding dress is white.
I noticed the bride looking daggers at the best man as he started making vulgar jokes during his speech.
We stood outside the church, hoping to catch a glimpse of the bride.
The bride and groom were both thrilled with how everything turned out.
It's not the done thing to wear white to a wedding unless you're the bride.
words.defineEn: a woman on her wedding day, or just after or before her wedding ceremony
words.defineVi: một người phụ nữ trong ngày cưới của cô ấy, hoặc ngay sau hoặc trước lễ cưới của cô ấy

examples: The lioness carefully groomed her newborn baby.
The bride and groom were both thrilled with how everything turned out.
They groom victims.
because, sadly, the groom died.
The groom has kissed the bride, after years of practicing on his sister.
words.defineEn: a man on his wedding day, or just before and after the ceremony
words.defineVi: một người đàn ông trong ngày cưới của mình, hoặc ngay trước và sau buổi lễ

examples: A 2015 study asked couples for their best piece of financial advice to newlyweds.
So the rumor has it you guys are newlyweds, is that right?
And newlyweds were often given a pair so they could start breeding a herd for their new family.
And we're newlyweds right now, and we're just enjoying each other.
words.defineEn: someone who has recently gotten married
words.defineVi: một người vừa mới kết hôn
